  • Constructor Details

    • DYAction

      public DYAction()
      Creates an action which runs at any FileChangeEvent of a file in DYWatcher.getDyList(). By default this action will affect all files in that list. If you want to perform this action only for a specific yaml file and not all, use DYAction(DreamYaml) or setYaml(DreamYaml). Do not use setAffectAll(boolean) to true alone. You really have to pass a DreamYaml object.

    • DYAction

      public DYAction​(DreamYaml yaml)
      Creates an action which runs at the FileChangeEvent of a specific yaml file.
